title: Anyone else just get this?
body: I'm on the boards daily, but today I had a "2" in the Notifications alert. Both Notifications are from months ago, and contain dead links to a http://community.i.leagueoflegends.com

replies.body: ya i just got those too
Too bad I can't go there. Riot will never know I got it.

Today, someone will be like "Guys! I fixed Notifications!".

The team will open up the link (which, thanks to the wonders of IT probably still works if you're physically at Riot HQ) and be like "if you fixed it, why aren't we seeing any replies?"

I really wanted to see what was in the "yordle trap" too.
They'll never know how bad they're messing up with their champions either....
